DOC.brief_title: Physical Mental Assessment Older Patients With Newly Diagnosed Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Test feasibility pre-treatment , bedside assessment functional cognitive status old adult newly diagnose acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) . Secondary - Obtain preliminary data regard predictive value pre-treatment , bedside assessment functional cognitive status overall survival , length hospitalization early death . OUTLINE : This prospective study . At baseline , patient complete questionnaire include Vulnerable Elders Survey ( functional status ) , Mini-Mental Status Exam ( cognition ) , Center Epidemiologic Studies-Depression . Patients also undergo physical function test via Short Physical Performance Battery hand grip strength . Further information parameter obtain periodic medical chart review . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year .
